post.body: Good morning, Dinneen! Have a great day! Happy you're here...finally. :-)
Thanks! Will do!
Planning to start in SF to visit family and then heading down to visit clients in LA and SD. Flexible, though.
Cool! Me too! SO excited. Let's connect next week!!! In the meantime, I'll be thinking..... :-)
That's a serious goal of mine. Enjoy!
Be fun to collaborate on something in 09, could brainstorm on our early mornings. :-)
Sure has, but really excited for 2009!!
Thanks! Will need it. You too!
you, too, Patty! And Happy New Year!
Yup - usually done for the day around the time they're getting off the bus. Can't beat that! Great reminder!
Ha, not sure, but a big ol' excuse for the kids to stay up past bedtime. Fun for them, exhausting for me.
I'm at my peak in the morning, not unusual to get at at 4am to work, but by 2, 3, I'm spent, and by 8pm - ready for bed
I even tried to sleep in this morning, but that never happens. I should nap this afternoon, that never happens either.
Staying in and trying my best to stay awake with the kids to watch the ball drop. How 'bout you?
I nominate @MariSmith for a Shorty Award in #socialmedia 'cuz she's fun, friendly and provides heaps of useful Facebook tips!
It benefits me to tell my MM group and accountability buddy, not necessarily posting on my blog or twitter. You?
Have fun Margie!
Not me, but planning on scheduling this time off in my calendar next year, for sure! You?
In CA mid-late April. Looking for networking, workshop, marketing, etc event to hit while I'm there. Ideas?
Fitting two days of work into one to enjoy an extra, extra, EXTRA long weekend. Nothing beats being the boss!
